title: Associação Sportiva São Domingos
text:
Associação Sportiva São Domingos was a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Marechal%20Deodoro%2C%20Alagoas">Marcehal Deodoro</a>, <a href="Alagoas">Alagoas</a>. The club last participated in the <a href="Campeonato%20Alagoano%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Alagoano Segunda Divisão</a> in the 2018 season. 
They competed in the <a href="Campeonato%20Brasileiro%20S%C3%A9rie%20B">Série B</a> once.
History.
The club was founded on 1 September 1970. They won the <a href="Campeonato%20Alagoano%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Alagoano Second Level</a> in 1999, since they were the only participating team. São Domingos competed in the <a href="Campeonato%20Brasileiro%20S%C3%A9rie%20B">Série B</a> in <a href="1972%20Campeonato%20Brasileiro%20S%C3%A9rie%20B">1972</a>, when they were eliminated in the First Stage of the competition.
Stadium.
Associação Sportiva São Domingos play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Jos%C3%A9%20Cordeiro">Estádio José Cordeiro</a>, nicknamed "Cordeirão". The stadium has a maximum capacity of 2,000 people.
